resources.string: Green Tea Blended with mint, lemongrass and lemon verbena, then sweetened just right and given a good shake with ice.
Basically, a tea latte is equal parts hot tea and steamed milk.
Starbucks Orange Mango Smoothie.A nourishing blend of natural orange juice, a banana, milk,fiber powder and ice.
Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino® Blended Beverage.This has rich and creamy blend of vanilla bean, milk and ice.
By Starbucks definition, a cappuccino is mostly milk foam, which weighs a lot less than milk.
Thai Tea is made from strongly-brewed black tea, often spiced with ingredients like star anise, crushed tamarind, cardamon
After water,tea is the most consumed drink in the world.Every single drop of tea comes from the same type of plant
Bubble Tea is the wide variety of refreshing flavoured fruit teas and milk teas served ice cold or piping hot with chewy tapioca balls!
Smooth and creamy matcha sweetened just right and served with steamed milk.This will transport your senses to pure delight.
